headline: HoldCo Activism Refocuses KeyCorp On Governance, Buybacks And Valuation Gap
summary: HoldCo Asset Management secured a series of governance changes at KeyCorp (NYSE:KEY), including the appointment of a new independent director. KeyCorp agreed to pause acquisitions and initiate a substantial stock buyback program following discussions with HoldCo. The agreement was reached through shareholder engagement without a proxy contest, marking a major shift in the bank's oversight and capital priorities. KeyCorp runs a regional banking business, with a focus on consumer, small...
